lines.i: Information on whether or not the infant was transferred within 24 hours of delivery.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.29"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:432)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:434)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:433)/@code="73758-5" Infant was transferred within 24 hours of delivery (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
The code value indicates the observation refers to the transfer of an infant.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:435)
A Boolean value to indicate whether or not the infant was transferred within 24 hours of delivery.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:436)
If the infant has been transferred, the name of the facility is collected - if it is known.
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="DST" (CONF:437)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:438)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SDLOC" (CONF:439)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] scopingEntity (CONF:440)
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ORG" (CONF:441)
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE" (CONF:442)
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:443)
The name of the facility the infant was transferred to.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:432)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:434)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:433)/@code="73758-5" Infant was transferred within 24 hours of delivery (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
The code value indicates the observation refers to the transfer of an infant.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:435)
A Boolean value to indicate whether or not the infant was transferred within 24 hours of delivery.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:436)
If the infant has been transferred, the name of the facility is collected - if it is known.
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="DST" (CONF:437)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:438)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SDLOC" (CONF:439)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] scopingEntity (CONF:440)
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ORG" (CONF:441)
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE" (CONF:442)
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:443)
The name of the facility the infant was transferred to.

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <id root="MDHT" extension="1343697558"/> <code code="2088558330"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="BL"/> <participant typeCode="DST"> <participantRole classCode="SDLOC"/> </participant> </observation>
